attributes.action: A Referendum to Abolish the Scottish Parliment & Scottish Gov 63A Scot Act 1998.
attributes.additional_details: Provide Referendum a democratic referendum  to Abolish the Scottish Parliment & Scottish Government 63A  A remedy provided in the Scotland Act 1998    "In view of that commitment it is declared that the Scottish Parliament and the Scottish Government are not to be abolished except on the basis of a decision of the people of Scotland voting in a referendum."
attributes.background: Referendum to Abolish the Scottish Parliment & Scottish Government 63A              "In view of that commitment it is declared that the Scottish Parliament and the Scottish Government are not to be abolished except on the basis of a decision of the people of Scotland voting in a referendum."

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634090
